scenario.name: Proxy UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:perf-receiver@sip-servlets.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Barreiro" <sip:barreiro@sip-servlets.com>;tag=[call_number][pid] To: "Receiver" <sip:perf-receiver@sip-servlets.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:barreiro@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=callee 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000
ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK [routes] Contact: sip:barreiro@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Test Content-Length: 0
